content.question: The net primary production of a pine forest on a lava flow on Mount Fuji is about <math alttext="175,000 kilocalories per square meter per year" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>175</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>000</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mtext>kcal/m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>/yr</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, and the plant respiration is estimated to be <math alttext="115,000 kilocalories per square meter per year" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>115</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>000</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mtext>kcal/m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>/yr</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>. What is the total amount of energy transferred during photosynthesis for this ecosystem?

choices.label: <math alttext="60,000 kilocalories per square meter per year" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>60</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>000</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mtext>kcal/m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>/yr</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="115,000 kilocalories per square meter per year" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>115</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>000</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mtext>kcal/m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>/yr</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="175,000 kilocalories per square meter per year" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>175</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>000</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mtext>kcal/m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>/yr</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="290,000 kilocalories per square meter per year" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>290</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>000</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mtext>kcal/m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>/yr</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="290,000 kilocalories per square meter per year" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>290</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>000</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mtext>kcal/m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>/yr</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Calculate an accurate numeric answer with appropriate units.
